Stranato, like an expert, avoided them. Stronghold didn't really feel much.=
 Airbomber goes down and hides behind Blender. Blender fires a huge missile=
 into the sky that makes a whistling noise before dropping in front of the =
Chivtron base. Arrow braces himself for this and Sarge is too far away for =
it to do any damage to him. Boom. Arrow takes a good deal of damage but doe=
sn't let it affect him...
